entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add `maui-blazor-empty` Project Template #8616
  • Border.IsVisible binding property changed event not work on Android. #8615
  • GTK MapRenderer uses IP Services for geolocation. #8614
  • it looks like the webpage at https:/0.0.0.0/ might be having issues #8613
  • BundleResource by default include to a nested directory, which can be confusing #8612
  • WebView Cancel not working #8611
  • Hot Reload is a Hot Mess - Bring Back Designer Please #8610
  • .PNG Tab Icons on iOS aren't scaled properly #8609
  • CollectionView SelectionChangedCommand does not invoke if Button is the root element of the datatemplate #8608
  • After orientating the screen from portrait to landscape the data on screen is getting overlapped. #8607
  • AppThemeBinding doesn't work on iOS in runtime #8606

Closed

  • Label Height doesn't get updated with text #8588
  • MAUI won't build with Preview 17.3 #8360
  • Name of recipe is being announced by Voiceover but its not visible for visual users. #5814
    6.0-servicing
  • Name of recipe is not visible in landscape mode. #5819
    6.0-servicing
  • Name of recipe is working as a button but Voiceover doesn’t announce its role. #5823
    6.0-servicing
  • BlazorWebView NavigationManager in WPF #8583
  • Voiceover focus is going to some hidden content after "Keto" in search by diet section. #5815
    6.0-servicing
  • Voiceover is unnecessarily announcing as a heading at "Click here to View full recipe" link and "Add to My Recipes" button. #5821
    6.0-servicing
  • Voiceover is not reading the label name when focus move to text field. #5822
    6.0-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CheckBox's VisualStates #8605
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Android more cores #8604
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Fix for odd Cursor behavior #7371
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [xamlc] add compiled PointTypeConverter #8599
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Just call Arrange to set the Frame #8569
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • [xamlc] add compiled BrushTypeConverter #8567
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • Implement menu separators #8565
    area/controls 🎮, control-menubar, .NET 7
  • Add updated Tools paths #8600
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎
